channel.title: vegetarian on My Cookbook
channel.description: Recent content in vegetarian on My Cookbook

item.title: Chop Suey
item.description: Ingredients chicken breast or pork cut into small size -optional 1 cauliflower 1 piece carrot 8 pieces baby corn - optional 1 piece red bell pepper 1 piece green bell pepper ½ cabbage chopped 1 piece onion 4 cloves garlic crushed ¼ cup soy sauce 1 tablespoons oyster sauce - optional ¾ cup water 1 tablespoon cornstarch diluted in ½ cup water ¼ teaspoon ground black pepper 3 tablespoons cooking oil Instructions Heat oil in a wok or pan.

item.title: Paneer Tikka Masala
item.description: Tikka 2 tbsp yoghurt 1 tbsp chickpea flour 1 tsp paprika powder 1.5 tsp coriander powder 0.5 tsp masala powder 0.25 tsp turmeric powder less than 0.5 tsp salt Mix everything well, then coat paneer, bell pepper and onion pieces well. Put it in the refrigerator for 20 minutes. Then roast them on oil or butter until they become golden brown. Masala gravy 2 tbsp oil 0.
